modName: Tiberius Imperial Faithfull or True Son of Skyrim
summary: Tiberius is a Nord that had is life saved in a young age by an Imperial commander; and has been in the service of the imperial army since then; but he never forgot is nordic roots and with the recent turn of events in skyrim he starts to doubt in what side he should be fighting.
descriptionHtml:
MOD: Captain Tiberius Imperial Faithfull or True Son of Skyrim?

INTRODUCTION:

Tiberius is a custom voiced follower that is fearsome in battle 
when wielding War Axes in his hands.

Description:

Tiberius is a Nord that had is life saved when he was young boy by a commander
of the imperial army while is village was attacked by the thalmor during 
the war with the Elves.
Both is mother and father were killed in that attacked; so the boy was
raised from that day forward by the commander that rescued i\'m.
Educated in the arts of war from a young age; tiberius has grown up to 
be great soldier; but he also never forgot is nordic roots.
But with the rebelion of the stormcloaks, the civil war and the prohibition
of the worship of Talos; Tiberius starts to doubt in which side he should be
fighting on.
Maybe with the help of the Dovahkiin he shall choose the right side to fight for.

Tiberius is essential and has perks that enhance the dual wielding of weapons;
specialy war axes.
He carrys with i\'m a diary where he tells is story from his youth until now.
You can find him at the Four Shields Tavern in Dragon Bridge.

Installation:

Just place the Data folder in your skyrim folder and check if the Tiberius.esp 
is activated.

Uninstalling:

Deactivate the Tiberius.esp file or delete it and the files that come with it.

PS: Don\'t forget to comment about the mod and tell me what you think; and if 
you really liked it don\'t forget to endorse it. Thanks; and Talos be with you!
author: Sergeynest
